com.lavanya.api.repository

Interface UserRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,java.lang.Integer>

    @Repository
public interface UserRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<User,java.lang.Integer>
    Repository extending JPA repository for persistence of User object.

      • findFilteredUser

        @Query(value="select u from User u where ?1 is null or concat(u.lastName, u.city, u.area) LIKE %?1% order by lastName")
java.util.List<User> findFilteredUser(java.lang.String keyword)
        Query to retrieve a list of users using pagination based or not with the following filter criteria: keyword that can be lastname, city, area.
        Parameters:
        keyword - to specify the element to filter the book search with.
        Returns:
        Page of Book.

        Returns:
